definitions.definition: The act of glorifying or the state of being glorified .
Specifically, the ascension (of Christ or humans) to the glory of heaven .
The worshiping of a deity ; extolment or laudation .
The portrayal of something as being ideal ; idealization .

main_definition: The act of glorifying or the state of being glorified .
secondary_definitions: Specifically, the ascension (of Christ or humans) to the glory of heaven .
The worshiping of a deity ; extolment or laudation .
The portrayal of something as being ideal ; idealization .
